A10 War Thunder sight

Installation tutorial:
Go to war thunder directory open up "usersights" folder then download this sight
Extract this sight and put the extracted folder inside 'usersights'
Enjoy :)

F18 Sight for war thunder

Installation Tutorial:

Download the file.
Open the downloads folder and extract the .zip.
Move the extracted file to your user sights folder in the War Thunder directory.
Enjoy :)
